title: Grimoire Online - Novel Updates
tags: Magic   Male Protagonist   R-15   Virtual Reality
author: Gray Cat   Haineko   灰猫
description:
The release of the new generation interface 『Align』has opened the door to the world of virtual reality.

As doctors, commercials, educators, and a variety of new systems are trained, people seeking entertainment also begin to act in silence.

A lot of Virtual Reality games are released and those games also begin to diversify.

This time, a new online game was about to be birthed.

『Grimoire Online』

Reinforce, grow or develop your own grimoire and create a goal.

A new story begins in cyberspace.>
